entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for March 22, 2024
The Far Side comic 2 for March 22, 2024

summary.caption: Until his medical license was suspended, cosmetic surgeon Dr. Irwin Blumenfeld left many of his patients with the tragic side effect known as “buffalo nose.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for March 22, 2024

summary.caption: To the horror of the lifeboat's other members, Madonna loses her balance and falls on her face.

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for March 22, 2024

summary.caption: “Give me a hand here, Etta … I got into a nest of wiener dogs over on Fifth and Maple.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for March 22, 2024

summary.caption: “What the —? Ketchup? We followed a ketchup trail for three miles?”
